title: Beef stroganoff made easy
ingredients: ['4 bags of boil in the bag rice', '1 tablespoon oil', '2 fillet steaks, thinly sliced', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '200g mushrooms, sliced', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 pinch dried mixed herbs', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '2 OXO® stock cubes', '400ml crème fraîche or single cream']
